= Ensembl DAS  =

http://www.ensembl.org/info/data/ensembl_das.html

= How to use the Ensembl DAS through the Biological Web Services Proxy =

To use Ensembl DAS through the proxy the following parameters should be added to the proxy URL:

*bwsp_service* = Ensembl_DAS

Name of the service

*bwsp_response_format* = row | json

Response format, could be the row xml format provided by the iHOP web service or JSON. 

*bwsp_callback* = callback name

If provided the response of the server is a JSONP function 

*bwsp_url* = Ensembl DAS url

Ensembl DAS url. See the following examples

= Examples =

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=ensembl_das&bwsp_response_format=json&&bwsp_url=http://www.ensembl.org/das/dsn

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=ensembl_das&bwsp_response_format=json&&bwsp_url=http://www.ensembl.org/das/sources

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=ensembl_das&bwsp_response_format=json&&bwsp_url=http://www.ensembl.org/das/Homo_sapiens.NCBI36.transcript/features?segment=13:31787617,31871806

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=ensembl_das&bwsp_response_format=json&&bwsp_url=http://www.ensembl.org/das/Gallus_gallus.WASHUC1.reference/sequence?segment=1:1,1000
